Invocation Name: hangman kids
des:
Welcome to Hangman Kids. The game where Alexa thinks of a word and children and adults try to guess it by suggesting letters. 

● Hangman Kids is a pedagogical game where your kids will learn to spell in a pleasant and simple way, thus developing logic and reflection.

■ How doy you play? It is super easy. Just say "Alexa" and a letter. For example :
- "Alexa, A"
- "Alexa an A"
- "Alexa, letter A"

● If the kids get stuck, the game will provide hints and jokers to guess the secret word. Just say: 
- "Alexa, joker". Use jokers to display a letter without revealing the whole word.
- "Alexa, hint". Kids will have the possibility to ask for hints, only once per word.

● Conclusively, Hangman Kids is a truly complete game for the cognitive development of our children also without any doubt that will make them and the elders nearby have a good time.

▼ Please, leave us your opinion, suggestions for new categories, or improvements.

We hope you enjoy the game and help us improve it.
Many thanks from the Escenit Games team!
